meanings.sent1: The tyees of the tribe made important decisions for the community.
meanings.sent2: The tyees led the tribe with wisdom and strength.
meanings.sent3: The tyees organized a fun festival for the whole village.
meanings.sent4: The tyees stood tall like a mighty oak tree among the people.
meanings.sent5: The tyees wore a feathered headdress that symbolized his leadership.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen caught a tyees in the river.
meanings.sent2: The tyees was so big that it took two people to carry it.
meanings.sent3: The tyees salmon tried to swim upstream but kept bumping into rocks.
meanings.sent4: The tyees salmon shimmered in the sunlight like a silver coin.
meanings.sent5: The tyees salmon was the prize catch of the day for the fishermen.

meanings.definition: A title given to a chief or leader.
meanings.sent1: The people respected the tyees and followed his guidance.
meanings.sent2: The tyees was honored with the title after years of service to the tribe.
meanings.sent3: The tyees title came with a fancy hat and a shiny badge.
meanings.sent4: The tyees title carried the weight of responsibility and honor.
meanings.sent5: The tyees title was passed down through generations of leaders.
